title: Turning Point on a Driving Date

infobox.Title:: Turning Point on a Driving Date
infobox.Japanese title:: ドライブデートの別れ道  (Doraibu Dēto no Wakaremichi)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Wataru Takagi
infobox.Animation director:: Seiji Muta (supervisor)  Yui Ushinohama, Chie Morishita (asst.), and Hiroaki Takagi (asst.)

infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Yūko Sanpei as Kei Nakanishi  Kaoru Akiyama as Remi Kirisaki  Yoshiko Okamoto as Kiyomi Fukurai  Hideaki Nonaka as Eiji Kamatari  Yoichi Nishijima as Tan Yamazumi  Shunsuke Kanie as Motorcyclist
infobox.Opening song:: Sekai wa Anata no Iro ni Naru

sections.Trivia:
- The motorcyclist's bike's license plate number is 新宿 C ひ, 10 - 96 (Shinjuku C Hi, 10 - 96).
- A charcoal brown Toyota Prius is seen at the roadblock. Its license plate number is 新宿 381, よ 68 - 20 (Shinjuku 381, Yo 68 - 20).
- Remi's car is a red Suzuki Swift.
- Anime-original location: North Haido Town (杯戸北町).
